Title: Prohibits the state or political subdivisions from imposing a mask mandate in schools and daycares and leaving such decisions to the local school district, non-public school or daycare
Summary: Prohibits the state or political subdivisions from imposing a mask mandate in schools and daycares; leaves such decisions to the local school district, non-public school or daycare.
ActClause: AN ACT to prohibit the state or political subdivisions from imposing a mask mandate in schools and daycares and leaving such decisions to the local school district, non-public school or daycare
